attributes.action: Send the parents of murdered Daniel Pelka to prison in Poland
attributes.additional_details: The so called parents of innocent helpless Daniel Pelka murdered him in the cruelest way. The minimum 30 years they have received is no where near enough even life wouldn't be punishment for what they did. Sign this petition to help send them back to Poland to serve their time. They took away any basic human rights that boy had so they shouldn't have any.
